revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_SetFloat}} '''A_SetFloat'''
(no parameters)
Makes a monster floating. Floating monsters can change their z-position when moving towards a target. Setting this is only useful when combined with [[A_NoGravity]] or setting the '''{{flag|NOGRAVITY}}''' flag.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
{{DEFAULTSORT:SetFloat}}[[category:Decorate Status change functions]]
